name: Light Bots
description:
Light bots is a platformer, in which you control robots to solve puzzles.

Waking up in a dark damp factory, take control of robots and zap panels to solve puzzles to try and escape, but keep a watchful eye as they are watching you.

Made in Unity for the Ludum Dare 45.

(made with the experimental 2d tools for unity)

Controls:

W, A, S and D for movement

Q to switch control

E to interact

Has controller support just click the button in the top left for controller tooltips

Left Stick for movement

Y to switch control

X to interact
